mapper.select: select ps.id, ps.sku_code, ps.sku_name, ps.product_id, ps.thumb_img, ps.sale_price, ps.market_price, ps.cost_price, ps.sku_spec, ps.weight, ps.volume, ps.status, ss.available_num, ss.sale_num from product_sku ps left join product p on ps.product_id = p.id left join sku_stock ss on ps.id = ss.sku_id where p.status = '1' and p.audit_status = '1' and ps.del_flag = '0' and p.del_flag = '0' and ss.del_flag = '0' order by ss.sale_num desc limit 20
